main event: An unidentified celestial object was reported by Mr. F. X. Aller on July 29, 1962.
interesting points: The object was reported to look like a satellite or bright star., The sighting took place at 2118 G.M.T. in clear weather conditions., The object was visible for about 7 minutes., The report was acknowledged by the U.S. Naval Oceanographic Office and forwarded to the National Aerial Phenomena Agency., The object was seen in the vicinity of Regulus traveling towards Vega.
